What is included:

There are more than 200 dictionaries of 11 languages:
* English
* German
* French
* Italian
* Spanish
* Portugese
* Chinese

Also included:

How to install ABBYY Lingvo x3 Mobile on your Windows Mobile-running PDA/Smartphone:

1. Download proper cab for your device
2. Install it (preferably on storage card)
3. Download dictionaries, sounds, morphological dictionaries you need
4. Copy them to folder where your lingvo is installed (for example, \Storage Card\Program Files\ABBYY Lingvo x3
5. Run the app
6. New folders will be found
7. Enjoy!!
